## Installation

You can install the latest release of gsm.utils from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("Gilead-BioStats/gsm.utils@*release‚Å†")
```

::: {.pkgdown-devel}
You can install the development version of gsm.utils from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("Gilead-BioStats/gsm.utils")
```
:::
